name: Mera kuchupuchu babygirl
greetingText:
So apparently it’s Valentine’s Day and I’m writing you a digital letter because apparently we require addresses for physical things.

Anyway.
wishText:
I like you…wait I like you?OMG wait I might just love you. Like love-love you???WHAT even!?

Things I might not always be able to say –you calm me;And somehow you feel like home after a vacation,coming back and finally exhaling;I like us, how we just fit together;how I’m staying (and waiting patiently ke Maharaj kab aaenge)How choosing you feels natural, as if you always belonged with me!!!Also yes, full disclosure: I fully intend to brainwash you into loving me forever.This is a threat!!!

Okay bas.Before I overthink this and ruin the moment,Happy Valentine’s Day mera kuchupuchu aloo paratha muaahhh
Main tenu samjhawan ki
Na tere bina lagda ji,
Tu ki jaane pyaar mera
Main karun intezar tera
Tu dil tui yon jaan meri
